conclusion: Analyze the v-t graphs of both cars to determine their positions at t = 10 s.
Car A's v-t graph is a horizontal line at v = 40 m/s, indicating constant speed.
Car B's v-t graph is a straight line passing through the origin.
Determine the slope of Car B's v-t graph as 2 m/sÂ².
Equation of Car B's v-t graph is v = 2t.
Calculate distance traveled by Car A at t = 10 s as 400 m.
Calculate distance traveled by Car B at t = 10 s as 100 m.
Compare distances: Car A has traveled 400 m, Car B has traveled 100 m.
Car A is ahead of Car B at t = 10 s.
